item.title: Andy Grammer - Don't Give Up On Me (From $quot;Five Feet Apart$quot;)
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Don’t Give Up On Me on the ukulele by Andy Grammer. The chords used are F Bb C Dm.
Original song in E Version in D - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3BiDJubzEw4 Version in C - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tr1oFEEJz7M
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
▶ Check out my gear on Kit: https://kit.com/AndyRamos
